channel.title: [Deiti] Project DEITI remaking all skills in 2007 [Deiti]
channel.description:
[img]http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/4161/deititry.png[/img]
[b]Introduction[/b] This will be a development to make all skills made in 2007 of runescape, excluding combat and construction. This is based on my own highly modified delta. The goal of this project is to complete all skills that were in 2007, and have them perfect. We also have the goal of this to make it as efficient as possible, using [b]NO process code[/b], and using [b]graham's cycle based task manager.[/b] We will also have all sounds with the skills. We decided to not do combat since it is simply terrible. Later we might work on it once we finish all skills. I will never release this.
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img] [b]Mining[/b]
[ul][li]All rocks can be mined[/li] [li]All correct respawn times[/li] [li]Accurate formula based off of skill level/pick[/li] [li]Correct level requirement[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img] [b]Smithing[/b]
[ul][li]All equipment smith able[/li] [li]Correct level requirements[/li] [li]All options[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img] [b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][li]Moving fishing locations[/li] [li]All spots with correct fishing equipment[/li] [li]Global spots on map[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img] [b]Cooking[/b]
[ul][li]All fish cookable[/li] [li]Correct level requirements[/li] [li]Pizzas, bread, etc.[/li] [li]All options working[/li] [li]Correct interface ("Cook ____")[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [b]Woodcutting[/b]
[ul][li]Stumps with correct respawning times per tree[/li] [li]Correct requirements[/li] [li]Non wielding axe cutting[/li] [li]Correct facing directions[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [b]Firemaking[/b]
[ul][li]Ashes after fire burning[/li] [li]Correct times for fire to keep burning[/li] [li]Different color lighting of fires[/li] [li]Correct level requirements + delays[/li] [li]Clipped [Players can't go through walls][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img] [b]Agility[/b]
[ul][li]All courses work[/li] [li]Chances of failing[/li] [li]Correct level requirements[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img] [b]Herblore[/b]
[ul][li]Identifying herbs[/li] [li]Potion making[/li] [li]All ingredients work[/li] [li]Weapon poisoning[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img] [b]Thieving[/b]
[ul][li]Npcs thieving[/li] [li]Object thieving[/li] [li]Stunning when pick pocketing[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Crafting[/b]
[ul][li]All options work[/li] [li]All items craft able[/li] [li]Tanning, gem crafting, etc.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [b]Runecrafting[/b]
[ul][li]All locations for different runes[/li] [li]Multiple crafting based on level[/li] [li]Pouches, tiaras, talismans.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img] [b]Fletching[/b]
[ul][li]All logs can be fletched[/li] [li]Can make arrows[/li] [li]Can string bows[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img] [b]Slayer[/b]
[ul][li]Low, medium, high tasks[/li] [li]Correct requirements[/li] [li]Slayer masters[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img] [b]Farming[/b]
[ul][li]All seeds working[/li] [li]Correct tolls req.[/li] [li]Growing[/li][/ul]
[b]Pictures:[/b] Upload them later.
[b]Credits:[/b] Daniel RandQm Delta

item.title: [Deiti] Project DEITI remaking all skills in 2007 [Deiti]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Introduction
This will be a development to make all skills made in 2007 of runescape, excluding combat and construction. This is based on my own highly modified delta. The goal of this project is to complete all skills that were in 2007, and have them perfect. We also have the goal of this to make it as efficient as possible, using NO process code, and using graham’s cycle based task manager. We will also have all sounds with the skills. We decided to not do combat since it is simply terrible. Later we might work on it once we finish all skills. I will never release this.

Mining

[ul][li]All rocks can be mined[/li]
[li]All correct respawn times[/li]
[li]Accurate formula based off of skill level/pick[/li]
[li]Correct level requirement[/li][/ul]

Smithing

[ul][li]All equipment smith able[/li]
[li]Correct level requirements[/li]
[li]All options[/li][/ul]

Fishing

[ul][li]Moving fishing locations[/li]
[li]All spots with correct fishing equipment[/li]
[li]Global spots on map[/li][/ul]

Cooking

[ul][li]All fish cookable[/li]
[li]Correct level requirements[/li]
[li]Pizzas, bread, etc.[/li]
[li]All options working[/li]
[li]Correct interface (“Cook ____”)[/li][/ul]

Woodcutting

[ul][li]Stumps with correct respawning times per tree[/li]
[li]Correct requirements[/li]
[li]Non wielding axe cutting[/li]
[li]Correct facing directions[/li][/ul]

Firemaking

[ul][li]Ashes after fire burning[/li]
[li]Correct times for fire to keep burning[/li]
[li]Different color lighting of fires[/li]
[li]Correct level requirements + delays[/li]
[li]Clipped [Players can’t go through walls][/li][/ul]

Agility

[ul][li]All courses work[/li]
[li]Chances of failing[/li]
[li]Correct level requirements[/li][/ul]

Herblore

[ul][li]Identifying herbs[/li]
[li]Potion making[/li]
[li]All ingredients work[/li]
[li]Weapon poisoning[/li][/ul]

Thieving

[ul][li]Npcs thieving[/li]
[li]Object thieving[/li]
[li]Stunning when pick pocketing[/li][/ul]

Crafting

[ul][li]All options work[/li]
[li]All items craft able[/li]
[li]Tanning, gem crafting, etc.[/li][/ul]

Runecrafting

[ul][li]All locations for different runes[/li]
[li]Multiple crafting based on level[/li]
[li]Pouches, tiaras, talismans.[/li][/ul]

Fletching

[ul][li]All logs can be fletched[/li]
[li]Can make arrows[/li]
[li]Can string bows[/li][/ul]

Slayer

[ul][li]Low, medium, high tasks[/li]
[li]Correct requirements[/li]
[li]Slayer masters[/li][/ul]

Farming

[ul][li]All seeds working[/li]
[li]Correct tolls req.[/li]
[li]Growing[/li][/ul]

Pictures:
Upload them later.

Credits:
Daniel
RandQm
Delta

Read full topic
